title: 53 43b 53 "Buggy's Back""The Legend Has Started! Head for the Grand Line!"Transliteration: "Densetsu wa Hajimatta! Mezase Idai Naru Kōro" (Japanese:伝説は始まった!目指せ偉大なる航路) Ken Koyama Michiru Shimada 614.1 January 10, 2001(2001-01-10)[92] July 23, 2005
transformers_text:
53 43b 53 "Buggy's Back""The Legend Has Started! Head for the Grand Line!"Transliteration: "Densetsu wa Hajimatta! Mezase Idai Naru Kōro" (Japanese:伝説は始まった!目指せ偉大なる航路) Ken Koyama Michiru Shimada 614.1 January 10, 2001(2001-01-10)[92] July 23, 2005

Miraculously saved from death by an unnatural green gust and a lightning bolt to Buggy, the Straw Hats rush out of Loguetown, only for Zoro to be stopped by Tashigi and Luffy to be stopped by Captain Smoker and saved by Dragon. The Straw Hats are able to escape Loguetown and proclaim why they are going to the Grand Line: Sanji to find the All Blue, Luffy to become King of the Pirates, Zoro to become the greatest swordsman in the world, Nami to chart a map of the entire world, and Usopp to become a brave warrior of the sea.
